name: holochain-rad-tools-phase-2
description: The second tier of RAD tools, automating a UI GraphQL and DNA generation based on a JSON schema file.

scripts.start: npm run hc:start-log; npm run ui:start
scripts.happ:generate: npm run happ:remove && npm run ui:generate && npm run hc:generate-dna && npm run happ:install
scripts.happ:install: cd dna-src/test && npm i && cd ../../ui-src && npm i && cd ..
scripts.happ:refresh: npm run hc:clean-storage && npm run sim2h:clear-local
scripts.happ:remove: npm run hc:clean-storage && rm -rf dna-src/ ui-src/ .cargo/ target/
scripts.hc:test: cd dna-src && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 HC_IGNORE_SIM2H_URL_PROPERTY=true hc test | node test/node_modules/faucet/bin/cmd.js
scripts.hc:start-log: npm run sim2h:start && holochain -c conductor-config.toml &> conductor.log &
scripts.hc:run: npm run hc:package && cd dna-src && hc run -p 3400
